title: Textile, 1790–99
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: madder colors (reds, black) block printed; yellow and blue applied by brush on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 53 x 41 cm (20 7/8 x 16 1/8 in.)
Repeat H x W (offset): 22.9 x 17.8 cm (9 x 7 in.)
description: Fragment of printed cotton with a small-scale over-all design of  brightly colored flowers and fine leaf sprigs on a dark brown background. Printed in several shades of greens, blues, reds and yellow, with reserved white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1790–99.
1790–99. Medium: cotton
Technique: madder colors (reds, black) block printed; yellow and blue applied by brush on plain weave. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-134.
